      • cutStr

        public static java.lang.String cutStr(java.lang.String inp,
                                      java.lang.String prelude,
                                      java.lang.String behind,
                                      int offset)
        Get substring by quote search key string.
        Parameters:
        inp - (String) Search original string data.
        prelude - (String) Prelude search key.
        behind - (String) Behind search key.
        offset - (int) Start offset of search position. [option]
        Returns:
        (String) Inner value between key. (Without key self).
